channel.title: [PI]Npc's can only be attacked by one person in a multi area
channel.description: I'm adding GWD to my PI base. Made it a multi area, and made it so you can attack an npc while under attack by another one. Whenever another person attacks a boss while someone else is fighting it, it says, this npc is already in combat. Would I resolve this in Npchandler or CombatAssistant? Any help please.
